name: Dr. D. Ranged's Incrediquest (Puzzle Adventure Game!)
blurb: A creative escape-style puzzle game ! Puzzles are best described as a cross between 7th Guest and Not-Pron ! Try the DEMO if you dare !

rewards.reward: IOS Game\r\n\r\nBacker credit.  INCLUDES: 1) Kickstarter exclusive digital wallpaper (your choice of any room in the game); 2) IOS game for iPad or web when released.*NOTE: to solve certain in-game puzzles all versions of the game will require access to an IOS device.

All Digital Package. INCLUDES: 1) Backer credit; 2) Kickstarter exclusive digital wallpaper (your choice of any room in the game); 3) IOS game for iPad or web when released; 4) Digital original sound track + themed custom sound player; 5)  Beta access to one puzzle for early review and input. *NOTE: to solve certain in-game puzzles all versions of the game will require access to an IOS device.

IOS Game and Puzzle Calendar. INCLUDES: 1) Backer credit; 2) Kickstarter exclusive digital wallpaper (your choice of any room in the game); 3) IOS version of game for iPad or web when released; 4) Digital original sound track + themed custom sound player; 5) Beta access to one puzzle for early review and input; 6) Physical calendar with 12 additional puzzles (one for each month) that when solved provide additional interactive in-game features. Includes US Shipping. *NOTE: to solve certain in-game puzzles all versions of the game will require access to an IOS device.

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL. Kickstarter Special Edition USB.  INCLUDES: 1) Backer credit; 2) Kickstarter exclusive digital wallpaper (your choice of any room in the game); 3) Dr. D. Ranged's Incrediquest special Kickstarter edition pre-loaded onto themed USB drive with all superhints unlocked and special exclusive in game content !; 4) Digital original sound track + themed custom sound player; 5) Beta access to one puzzle for early review and input. Includes US Shipping. *NOTE: to solve certain in-game puzzles all versions of the game will require access to an IOS device.

Kickstarter Special Edition USB.  INCLUDES: 1) Backer credit; 2) Kickstarter exclusive digital wallpaper (your choice of any room in the game); 3) Dr. D. Ranged's Incrediquest special Kickstarter edition pre-loaded onto themed USB drive with all superhints unlocked and special exclusive in game content !; 4) Digital original sound track + themed custom sound player; 5) Beta access to one puzzle for early review and input. *NOTE: to solve certain in-game puzzles all versions of the game will require access to an IOS device.

Kickstarter Special Edition USB + IOS. INCLUDES: 1) Backer credit; 2) Kickstarter exclusive digital wallpaper (your choice of any room in the game); 3) Dr. D. Ranged's Incrediquest special Kickstarter edition pre-loaded onto themed USB drive with all superhints unlocked and special exclusive in game content !;  4) IOS version of game for iPad or web when released; 5) Digital original sound track + themed custom sound player; 6) Beta access to one puzzle for early review and input. Includes US Shipping. *NOTE: to solve certain in-game puzzles all versions of the game will require access to an IOS device.

Kickstarter Special Edition USB + IOS + Calendar. INCLUDES: 1) Backer credit; 2) Kickstarter exclusive digital wallpaper (your choice of any room in the game); 3) Dr. D. Ranged's Incrediquest special Kickstarter edition pre-loaded onto themed USB drive with all superhints unlocked and special exclusive in game content !; 4) IOS version of game for iPad or web when released; 5) Digital original sound track + themed custom sound player; 6) Beta access to one puzzle for early review and input; 7) Physical calendar with 12 additional puzzles (one for each month) that when solved provide additional interactive in-game features. Includes US Shipping. *NOTE: to solve certain in-game puzzles all versions of the game will require access to an IOS device.

Custom Dr. D. Ranged Message and Signed Photo Print. INCLUDES: 1) Backer credit; 2) Kickstarter exclusive digital wallpaper (your choice of any room in the game); 3) Dr. D. Ranged's Incrediquest special Kickstarter edition pre-loaded onto themed USB drive with all superhints unlocked and special exclusive in game content !; 5) IOS version of game for iPad or web when released; 6) Digital original sound track + themed custom sound player; 7) Beta access to one puzzle for early review and input; 8) Physical calendar with 12 additional puzzles (one for each month) that when solved provide additional interactive in-game features; and 9) Create a custom 30 second message  and spoken by Dr. D. Ranged- you will receive a sheet of 24 QR code stickers that link directly to your custom message 10) Also receive a limited edition photo print signed by the game's creator !!  *NOTE: to solve certain in-game puzzles all versions of the game will require access to an IOS device.

Help Design Your Own In-Game Puzzle. INCLUDES:1) Backer credit; 2) Kickstarter exclusive digital wallpaper (your choice of any room in the game); 3) Dr. D. Ranged's Incrediquest special Kickstarter edition pre-loaded onto themed USB drive with all superhints unlocked and special exclusive in game content !; 4) IOS version of game for iPad or web when released; 5) Digital original sound track + themed custom sound player; 6) Beta access to one puzzle for early review and input; 7) Physical calendar with 12 additional puzzles (one for each month) that when solved provide additional interactive in-game features; and 8) Create a custom 30 second message and spoken by Dr. D. Ranged- you will receive a sheet of 24 QR code stickers that link directly to your custom message 9) Also receive a limited edition photo print signed by the game's creator 10) Help design a unique puzzle featured in the game with prominent authorship credit.  Must seek pre-approval for this option to assure puzzle concept fits with vision of game and existing puzzles. *NOTE: to solve certain in-game puzzles all versions of the game will require access to an IOS device.

Supertron 9000 Puzzle Sponsor.  \r\nINCLUDES:1) Have your own IOS application featured in Incrediquest as a necessary component to solving one of the in-game Supertron 9000 puzzles. Guaranteed downloads and promotion of your IOS application.Must seek pre-approval for this option to assure application fits with vision of game  and existing puzzles.

Supertron 9000 Puzzle Sponsor and Design Your Own In-game Puzzle. INCLUDES: 1) Backer credit; 2) Kickstarter exclusive digital wallpaper (your choice of any room in the game); 3) Dr. D. Ranged's Incrediquest special Kickstarter edition pre-loaded onto themed USB drive with all superhints unlocked and special exclusive in game content !; 4) IOS version of game for iPad or web when released; 5) Digital original sound track + themed custom sound player; 6) Beta access to one puzzle for early review and input; 7) Physical calendar with 12 additional puzzles (one for each month) that when solved provide additional interactive in-game features;8) Help design a unique puzzle featured in the game with prominent authorship credit;9) Have your own IOS application featured in Incrediquest as a necessary component to solving one of the in-game Supertron 9000 puzzles. Guaranteed downloads and promotion of your IOS application. Must seek pre-approval for this option to assure application and puzzle conception fits with vision of game and existing puzzles. Includes US Shipping. *NOTE: to solve certain in-game puzzles all versions of the game will require access to an IOS device.
